name: DONKBASS DRIFTER
description:
Steer the car with your mouse and deliver hot pelmeni and kvass while knocking down all the shit that stands in your way!

In this game you use only one axis of your mouse, to control your car and deliver as much kvas and pelmenis as you can in only one minute.


Game by
Lev Kamenskii
Maks Loboda

Music by
SRPSKIBASS
Donks by Uamee
